Method.name: %OnNew
Method.Implementation:
if $data(initvalue) && $isobject(initvalue) { set ..author = initvalue.author set ..name = initvalue.name set ..path = initvalue.path set ..version = initvalue.version set ..license = initvalue.license set ..description = initvalue.description
set ..dependencies = initvalue.dependencies set ..keywords = initvalue.keywords set ..maintainers = initvalue.maintainers set ..items = initvalue.items set ..DirectoryPath = initvalue.DirectoryPathGet() } quit $$$OK

Method.name: %OnBeforeSave
UsePackageJsonProps
Method.Implementation:
#dim status As %Status = '$$$OK #dim metaInfo ; multi-dimentional array
#dim jsonText As %String = $get($$$CpmLastPkgJson) $$$CPMCOMPILELOG(jsonText)
if jsonText'="" { if '##class($$$JsonProvider).%ConvertJSONToObject(jsonText,,.metaInfo) { quit status } set status = $$$OK #if 0 #define SetProp(%prop,%from) ##continue if 'm%%prop { ##continue set ..%prop = %from.%prop ##continue } $$$SetProp(name,metaInfo) $$$SetProp(description,metaInfo) $$$SetProp(version,metaInfo) $$$SetProp(author,metaInfo) $$$SetProp(path,metaInfo) $$$SetProp(license,metaInfo) #else #define SetProp(%prop,%from) set ..%prop = %from.%prop write !,"Changing package properties to package.json values: ",! write ?8,..name, " => ", metaInfo.name, ! write ?8,..version, " => ", metaInfo.version, ! $$$SetProp(name,metaInfo) ; FIXME! Uh-oh, forcefully change name of a package. Which is primary idkey... $$$SetProp(description,metaInfo) $$$SetProp(version,metaInfo) $$$SetProp(author,metaInfo) $$$SetProp(path,metaInfo) $$$SetProp(license,metaInfo) #endif } quit status

Method.name: CreateOrOpenId
Load
ExportReadme
Method.Implementation: #dim readmeStream As %Stream.FileBinary = ##class(%Stream.FileBinary).%New() #dim fileName As %String = $$$UtilConcatPath(DirectoryName,..readmeFilename) set readmeStream.Filename = fileName do ..readmeText.Rewind() do readmeStream.Write(..readmeText.Read()) do readmeStream.%Save() quit $$$OK

Method.name: Export
Method.Description: common method for exporting package to the staging area regardless of a format it should generate package.json pointing to the appropriate container
Method.Implementation:
#dim status As %Status = $$$OK #dim DirectoryName As %String = $$$UtilConcatPath($$$CpmConfig.tempdir,..ExportableName()) do ##class(%Library.File).RemoveDirectoryTree(DirectoryName) do ##class(%Library.File).CreateDirectoryChain(DirectoryName) write !, "Exporting package files to: ", DirectoryName, !
#dim fileName As %String = $$$UtilConcatPath(DirectoryName,"package.json") // 1. export/generate metainfo #dim containerName As %String = ..ExportableName(..path) _ ".xml" ; FIXME if containerName="" { set containerName = ..ExportableName()_".xml" } set ..path = containerName do ..ExportJSON(fileName, $this) // FIXME - attribute case // 2. export container // FIXME - at the moment exporting only using XML set fileName = $$$UtilConcatPath(DirectoryName,containerName) #dim listItems = $lts(..items.Serialize(),",") #dim CpmTempNS As %String = ..NextTempNamespace() new $namespace zn CpmTempNS do $system.OBJ.Export(listItems,fileName) do ..ExportReadme(DirectoryName) quit $$$OK

Method.name: NextTempNamespace
Method.Implementation: "CpmTmp"

Method.name: LoadTemporarilyToNS
CreateTempDir
Method.Implementation: #dim tempDirectory As %String = $$$UtilConcatPath($$$CpmConfig.tempdir, ".github") set tempDirectory = $$$UtilConcatPath(tempDirectory, name) if tempDirectory = "" { write !, "Failed to calculate temporary directory",!! quit '$$$OK } write "Creating temp directory: ", tempDirectory,! do ##class(%Library.File).RemoveDirectoryTree(tempDirectory) do ##class(%Library.File).CreateDirectoryChain(tempDirectory) quit tempDirectory

Method.name: DownloadUrl
Method.Implementation: #dim archive = ##class(%Stream.FileBinary).%New() set archive.Filename = tempName #dim zipball As %Net.HttpResponse = $$$CpmRegistry.Get(url) do archive.CopyFromAndSave(zipball.Data)

Method.name: NotFound
Method.Description: not found the asked url (license, readme, etc.)
Method.Implementation: '$isobject(o) || (o.message = "Not Found")

UDLText.name: T
UDLText.Content: // ОШИБКА #5840: Невозможно импортировать файл 'C:\InterSystems\...\out\intersystems-ru-Cache-MDX2JSON-c8cc37d\.gitignore', т.к. этот тип не поддерживается.

Method.name: ExtractFileFromMessage
Method.Implementation: ##class(%File).GetFilename($piece(message, "'", 2))

Method.name: CouldbeSafelyIgnored
ProcessDirectoryNS
ImportFromObject
ImportFrom
Method.Implementation:
#dim status As %Status = $$$OK #dim githubApi As CPM.Registry.GitHubApi = ##class(CPM.Registry.GitHubApi).%New()
#dim repo As %ZEN.proxyObject = "" $$$THROWONERROR(status, githubApi.GetRepoInfo(repoName, .repo)) #dim license As %ZEN.proxyObject = "" $$$THROWONERROR(status, githubApi.GetLicense(repoName, .license)) #dim readme As %ZEN.proxyObject = "" $$$THROWONERROR(status, githubApi.GetReadme(repoName, .readme))
#dim releases As %ListOfObjects = "" $$$THROWONERROR(status, githubApi.GetReleases(repoName, .releases))
#dim latestRelease As %ZEN.proxyObject = "" $$$THROWONERROR(status, githubApi.GetReleaseInfo(repoName, ,.latestRelease))
quit ..ImportFromObject(repoName, dryRun, repo, license, readme, latestRelease)

Method.name: ImportAll
AddDirectoryItems
Method.Description: xml load from files in subdirectories, automatically register all as package item

Method.name: RegisterPackageDefinition
Method.Implementation: set $$$CpmLastPkgJson = jsonText

Method.name: AddProjectItems
Method.Description: load items from gibven project, automatically register all as package item

Method.name: AddXmlItems
ExportJSON
Method.Description: FIXME - at the moment we output attributes at the same case as properties written but we need them in low case eventually
Method.Implementation:
set io = $io set file = FileName open file:"WNS":0 else quit $$$ERROR($$$FileCanNotOpen,file) use file if $isobject(o) { Do ##class($$$JsonProvider).%ObjectToJSON(o,,,"aeloqtw") ; remove "c" modifier to avoid _class/_id generation } use io close file
quit $$$OK

Method.name: %DispatchSetProperty
Method.Description: is used to set the value of an unknown property.

Method.name: %DispatchGetProperty
Method.Description: Is used to get the value of an unknown property.
Method.Implementation: quit ""

Query.name: Search
Query.SqlQuery: SELECT id from ( SELECT id FROM package where UPPER(name) %INLIST UPPER(:Value) union all SELECT id FROM package where FOR SOME %ELEMENT(keywords) (%VALUE %INLIST(:Value)) union all SELECT id FROM package where description %CONTAINSTERM(:Value) union all SELECT id FROM package where FOR SOME %ELEMENT(maintainers) (%VALUE %INLIST(:Value)) ) GROUP BY id
